name: This Throne Is Mine - The Card Game
name_original: This Throne Is Mine - The Card Game
description:
You play as King of Qin, the one ended the 500-year civil war on this land. Act like a King to manage your follower and the royal court and unite the country. Ready to defence your throne?



Features
  • Dynamic Card: Each follower card is random generate, base on your strategy to pick those followers.
  • Control Royal Court: Each royal court card also had its own unique effect, you only can use it when you had well-controlled the royal court.
  • Events: Each events card will bring some negative effect, use your follower or royal court member to solve those problems



Content
  • Story Mode
  • 7 selected country on United Mode
